title: If Government fails to seize the benefits of Brexit, the Blob will gleefully drag us back into the bloc
description: Do you remember the Great Tomato Shortage of 2023? For a few weeks in February and March, our supermarket shelves were bereft of those gleaming, crimson, umami-flavoured globes. A combination of high energy prices and cold weather had caused a dearth across Europe.

title: To get to net zero, we may have to sell off the UK’s future

title: What do voters think of Sunak and Starmer? The focus group results are in!
description: Today, we look at what’s going on in voters’ minds. The Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg show, along with the polling company More In Common have organised a series of focus groups to understand public opinion and what’s going on behind the opinion polls with a range of voters in the north west of England.

title: Merton Labour councillor quits over Israel-Gaza posts
description: A councillor in south London who was suspended by the Labour Party over her comments on the Israel-Gaza conflict has resigned from the party. Councillor Caroline Charles said she was "kicked out" for calling for a "ceasefire now" on social media.

title: 'Nice guy but weak': Voters on Rishi Sunak and Sir Keir Starmer
description: A panel made up of Labour voters, Tory voters and the undecided have been sharing their thoughts on the Prime Minister, Rishi Sunak, and the leader of the opposition, Sir Keir Starmer. They're all from areas that swung from Labour to Conservative in the last general election, and have been speaking to the BBC's Laura Kuenssberg.
